hello everyone my name is Michael hall I
am the director of data at goat goat is
the world's largest marketplace for
buying and selling authentic sneakers
we started in 2015 and really we wanted
to solve the problem of counterfeit

motivation for the company comes from
one of our co-founders

v briefs and he absolutely loved these

like two decades later and Nike

and you know they shipped it to him he
opens up the box gets real excited and
lo and behold they're fake and so he
could not figure out why there wasn't
already a solution online to figure this
out right and so counterfeit product
actually remains the biggest problem
today in sneaker resale nike officially
is now the most counterfeited brand in
the world and one in ten shoes sold
online is fake so up here we have just a

trying to guarantee that shoes
authenticity
and so like I said goat launched in 2015
and we really wanted to solve the issue
of counterfeit sneakers online and
really bring trust and safety to an
industry that really needed it and so we
have a team of dozens of manual
authenticators like I said these guys
know you know 30 years worth of Jordans
front and back they know what they look
like they know what the stitching looks
like they they know how they smell
and and so they're able to really tell
whether these are real and fake and
that's kind of the manual process and so
we pioneered a model that we like to
call the ship to verify model and so how
that works is is the seller lists the
product with us right and then the buyer
you know scours the site finds the shoes
that they want and once they agree to
purchase it for a specific price a deal
is struck and it's shipped to us the
seller ships us the shoes and the buyer
gives us the money and we verify the
shoes manually with these people in a
warehouse and then once we determine
that it's authentic we go ahead and ship
the shoe off to the buyer and pay off
the seller pretty simple model right and
this allows us to provide a very retail
like experience for the buyers while
providing liquidity to the sellers to be
able to sell their product and like I
said every single sneaker is inspected
and authenticated using both that manual
method and then also machine learning
models since 2015 we've grown the
company a lot it's now the largest
sneaker market place in the world and we
have 600 employees over 600 employees we
have 12 million users of which 150,000
are sellers this is really a lucrative
business and in 2017 our very top tier
sellers each individually sold more than
two million dollars worth of product on
the on the site and in 2018 that same
group sold over 10 million dollars with
the product so this is getting to be big
business we have over 800,000 shoes for
sale on our platform in 40,000 different
SKUs and so I'm gonna run through a

models that
they want to build right because we

it's taken out of s3 and then basically

with with methods like these in the last
